response:
"datenschutz ist menschenrecht! warum geben wir unseren persönlichen daten so leichtfertig an tech-giganten ab? #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation:
"data protection is a human right! why do we give our personal data away so carelessly to tech giants? #dataprotection #privacy"

(note: the response is written in german, with hashtags in english to reflect the global nature of twitter)
